DOC.brief_summary: THIS STUDY IS NOT ENROLLING PATIENTS IN THE USA . To evaluate effect artemether/ lumefantrine auditory function .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Artemether - Lumefantrine , Other Malaria Drugs Their Effect Auditory Function
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 12 year age old P. falciparum parasitemia 50 100,000 parasites/μl History fever presence fever ( temperature ≥ 37.5°C ) Exclusion Criteria Signs/symptoms severe/complicated malaria Ingestion various antimalarial drug , antibiotic previous 2 week 2 month History drugrelated hear impairment . Abnormal hearing function study entry Exposure sustain loud noise , selfreport , within past 24 hour . Present ear problem ( Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply . )
